https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bjdDKMPSafCVFZ5RvllmLgasvR3.jpg Marie Wankelmut, once successful comic artist, lives among the prostitutes in Amsterdam's Red Light District. Nowadays drunken and bold, she gets into one conflict after another. A gruesome sobering event at her neighbors, forces her to take action. Bloody Marie
